title.rendered: Kids’ Corner + Reading Challenge + Perry Reno. + SmartMax

content.rendered:
Thursday’s Kids’ Corner

Join us on Thursday, July 27th, for Kids’ Corner at our Warner Robins location. Our special guest will be Chick-fil-A! Events will start promptly at 10:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. We will have a reading, juice/drinks, and giveaways.

 

Summer Reading Challenge

Our Summer Reading Challenge for 1st-12th grade ends on August 4th. Bring in your sheet with 10 completed squares for a $10.00 gift card. Complete all squares for a GRAND PRIZE entry! The winners will be announced on August 11th.

 

Perry Store

We are renovating our Perry store! To do this, we will have to close down for the month of August. However, our other three locations will be open for business.

 

New toys from SmartMax®

We now carry SmartMax®! These toys are colorful magnets that you can use to build all kinds of interesting structures or, in this case, an intriguing new creature known as Samity. Samity was created by some talented customers during a visit to our Riverside Dr. location in Macon.

Come check out our new SmartMax® toy line!
